name: Megaman: Rock N Roll
description: This installer extracts the Windows release and runs it natively through Godot v2.1.x
content:
files:
- game_package: https://dennisengelhard.files.wordpress.com/2019/12/megaman_rocknroll_1_11-3.zip
- godot_executable: https://downloads.tuxfamily.org/godotengine/2.1.6/Godot_v2.1.6-stable_x11.64.zip
game:
  exe: MegaMan_RocknRoll.x86_64
installer:
- extract:
    file: game_package
- extract:
    file: godot_executable
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/MegaMan_RocknRoll.x86_64
    src: $GAMEDIR/Godot_v2.1.6-stable_x11.64
